originContent: # Wyvernbox
translatedContent: # Wyvernbox

originContent: An addon for versatile inventory systems.
translatedContent: An addon for versatile inventory systems.

originContent: Scenes you may need are located inside `addons/wyvernbox_prefabs`. Just drag and drop!
translatedContent: Scenes you may need are located inside `addons/wyvernbox_prefabs`. Just drag and drop!

originContent: The `example/wyvernbox` folder contains some items and equipment stats to start. Be sure to check the example scenes, too!
translatedContent: The `example/wyvernbox` folder contains some items and equipment stats to start. Be sure to check the example scenes, too!

originContent: ## All you need:
translatedContent: ## All you need:

originContent: - One of the `InventoryView` objects,
translatedContent: - One of the `InventoryView` objects,

originContent: - An `InventoryTooltip` to inspect items (*maybe with a few `TooltipProperty` scripts attached*),
translatedContent: - An `InventoryTooltip` to inspect items (*maybe with a few `TooltipProperty` scripts attached*),

originContent: - A `GrabbedItemStackView` to move things around with a mouse,
translatedContent: - A `GrabbedItemStackView` to move things around with a mouse,

originContent: - And a couple `ItemType` resources to define item types.
translatedContent: - And a couple `ItemType` resources to define item types.

originContent: ## How it works:
translatedContent: ## How it works:

originContent: - `InventoryView`s provide user interaction with an `Inventory` of the matching type;
translatedContent: - `InventoryView`s provide user interaction with an `Inventory` of the matching type;

originContent: - an Inventory holds `ItemStack`s;
translatedContent: - an Inventory holds `ItemStack`s;

originContent: - an ItemStack is created from an `ItemType`.
translatedContent: - an ItemStack is created from an `ItemType`.

originContent: - the ItemType stores default data, and is used in crafting recipes and item generators.
translatedContent: - the ItemType stores default data, and is used in crafting recipes and item generators.

originContent: ## Features:
translatedContent: ## Features:

originContent: - A variety of inventories, all compatible with GUI containers, such as:
translatedContent: - A variety of inventories, all compatible with GUI containers, such as:

originContent: - Basic
translatedContent: - Basic

originContent: - Grid (*items take up a rectangle of tiles*)
translatedContent: - Grid (*items take up a rectangle of tiles*)

originContent: - Restricted (*can only put items with certain flags, like Equipment or Ammo*)
translatedContent: - Restricted (*can only put items with certain flags, like Equipment or Ammo*)

originContent: - Currency (*custom max stack size, but only specified items*)
translatedContent: - Currency (*custom max stack size, but only specified items*)

originContent: - Crafting and shops:
translatedContent: - Crafting and shops:

originContent: - Vending is a built-in feature of inventories, but for more configuration, use the `InventoryVendor` class!
translatedContent: - Vending is a built-in feature of inventories, but for more configuration, use the `InventoryVendor` class!

originContent: - Crafting recipes are defined through an `ItemConversion` - can give you pre-determined results, randomized counts, or a fresh new from an `ItemGenerator`!
translatedContent: - Crafting recipes are defined through an `ItemConversion` - can give you pre-determined results, randomized counts, or a fresh new from an `ItemGenerator`!

originContent: - Use `ItemPattern`s to match one of several items in filters or recipes, like different fuel types with different efficiency!
translatedContent: - Use `ItemPattern`s to match one of several items in filters or recipes, like different fuel types with different efficiency!

originContent: - **Gestures**: quick-transfer (Shift-Click), gather/transfer all items of type (Double-Click), split one/half (Right-Click)
translatedContent: - **Gestures**: quick-transfer (Shift-Click), gather/transfer all items of type (Double-Click), split one/half (Right-Click)

originContent: - Filter ground and inventory items via the versatile `ItemPattern` classes! Use them to control inventory insertion and crafting inputs.
translatedContent: - Filter ground and inventory items via the versatile `ItemPattern` classes! Use them to control inventory insertion and crafting inputs.

originContent: - Custom Inspector tables to map items to values in YOUR classes - used in ShopManager, ItemGenerator, and ItemPattern objects! Includes an Item Browser popup to easily drag-drop item types, generators and patterns from the project.
translatedContent: - Custom Inspector tables to map items to values in YOUR classes - used in ShopManager, ItemGenerator, and ItemPattern objects! Includes an Item Browser popup to easily drag-drop item types, generators and patterns from the project.

originContent: - Tooltips extensible with the `TooltipProperty` class! Just slam a bunch of scripts onto it.
translatedContent: - Tooltips extensible with the `TooltipProperty` class! Just slam a bunch of scripts onto it.

originContent: Made by Don Tnowe in 2022.
translatedContent: Made by Don Tnowe in 2022.
